messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2334
messages.msgSnippet: on 9/6/02 22:07, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... My son now has all his beanie babies arranged into boy scout troops.  The tiger cubs (cats), wolf
messages.messageBody:
on 9/6/02 22:07, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

>> My 9 year old has been doing kindergarten workbooks. She sets her
>> beanie babies all around her, writes down all of their names on
>> pieces of paper and puts checkmarks by their names (I think for
>> answering her questions? lol) They each take a turn answering a
>> question for her and if they don't understand something, she explains
>> it to them! She's really cute when she does that.
>> Sheila

My son now has all his beanie babies arranged into boy scout troops. The
tiger cubs (cats), wolf den (dogs) and bear dens were easy, but deciding
things like whether the giraffe should be a webelo or boyscout seemed to
require extensive study. Then every den needed a neat little sign and all
that. He's been at this for days. I really need to sweep his floor, but I
don't have the heart to move the "scouts". :)

brenda
p.s. the giraffe was deemed a webelo, but the dragon gets to be a boyscout
;)
